searchmethod: termsearch <- function(lookup, terms) {stringr::str_detect(lookup, stringr::regex(paste(terms, collapse = '|'), ignore_case = TRUE))}; initial <- dplyr::filter(DATA, termsearch(COLUMN, SEARCHTERMS)); excluded <- dplyr::filter(initial, termsearch(COLUMN, EXCLUSIONTERMS); final <- dplyr::setdiff(inital, excluded)

exclusionterms: consider the patient not to have heart failure
more time needed to decide on heart failure status

searchterms: Congestive heart failure due to valvular disease
Heart failure with normal ejection fraction
Heart failure with preserved ejection fraction
HFNEF - heart failure with normal ejection fraction
Chronic systolic dysfunction of left ventricle
